features.name: Executioner
features.description: When you hit a target with a weapon attack and the target has 50% or fewer hit points, you deal 10 additional damage.

features.name: Paragon Power
features.description:
At the end of another creature's turn, you may regain one reaction and choose one of the following:
A. Act: Take an action. You may also spend some or all of your remaining movement as part of that action.
B. Resist: Reroll a saving throw against an ongoing effect. Spend 20 hit points to gain advantage on the roll.

features.name: Paragon Defence
features.description: When you would fail a saving throw, you may spend 20 hit points to succeed.

features.name: Stomp
features.description: Save: DC 19 vs STR, reach 5 ft., two targets. Hit: The target is knocked prone.

features.name: Piston Smash
features.description: Melee: +11 to hit, reach 10 ft., two targets or the same target twice. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Firm Grasp
features.description: Save: DC 19 vs STR, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: The target is grappled by you.

features.name: Living Club
features.description: Requires: You must be grappling a creature. Melee: +11 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 34 (7d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Throw Creature
features.description: Requires: You must be grappling a creature. Ranged: +8 to hit, range 30 ft., one target. Hit: The target and the grappled creature both take 17 (3d8 + 4) bludgeoning damage and fall prone next to each other. Miss: The grappled creature falls prone next to the target.

features.name: Overcharge
features.description: Save: DC 18 vs DEX, a 20 ft. cone from self, all creatures. Hit: 51 (11d8 + 2) lightning damage. Miss: half damage.
